p: Prior distributions were based on literature and expert opinion. For assays based on a Gt3 antigen, prior emphasis was on a slightly higher specificity. For assays using more isotypes of antibodies in the conjugate, prior emphasis was on slightly higher sensitivity. The prior median and 95% ranges for sensitivity and specificity are shown in Table 1. The prior range for median prevalence was chosen from 0.5 to 0.9. Further (technical) details about model and priors may be found in Supplementary Material.
